display_long_description:
You’re not just a cleaner. You’re an undercover agent, infiltrating the world of **crime and insanity** by posing as a cleaner, secretly collecting evidence against a mysterious hitman. The hitman runs a large organization called the Syndicate.

[media]

The deeper you dig, the closer you get to uncovering how he operates—and how he does his assassinations.

[media]

The game has a scary layer. As you explore a crime scene, unsettling things could happen—shadows, whispers & apparitions.

[media]

**Your mission**: Infiltrate the Syndicate, and capture the Hitman. The Syndicate doesn’t tolerate failure. And they definitely don’t tolerate rats.

[media]

Each dead body has a background story of their own and you can explore more around to gather evidence and know more about the dead. The more you explore, the more rewarding it is. 

[media]

**Talk to the Devs and join our community on Discord**:  https://discord.gg/cK4aG9sp8f
display_long_description_unprocessed:
You’re not just a cleaner. You’re an undercover agent, infiltrating the world of **crime and insanity** by posing as a cleaner, secretly collecting evidence against a mysterious hitman. The hitman runs a large organization called the Syndicate.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/499618274_651211461159970_363128261145746290_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=GA5Hj7Yc7i0Q7kNvwGjC6sM&_nc_oc=Adktdc7Casr2WZAlmyafcapGfKrx3JqI_PGRI-o8RypMMwQTsXQkMvZHZbhwBfstM68&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=aCF9EVeQ9Dzp4Ta2iUKxiw&oh=00_AfpiSl_sC3QUuaC1dEFaKU6Nd3fWhsD7hKLfMhxoHUY-YA&oe=696B1296)

The deeper you dig, the closer you get to uncovering how he operates—and how he does his assassinations.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491828038_841072975026277_681659773377307198_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=IlsV9DbzPyYQ7kNvwE7HCD-&_nc_oc=AdnqRmhyn-EmzsOzPqOQxDCEj8DfuQvTVVLcqyd9zrTfeL81ibNUK5riVB74-WzII0E&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=aCF9EVeQ9Dzp4Ta2iUKxiw&oh=00_Afqgnkoi3jLfsDDFs8v9P8fO0OinRKHf6fuL8ieQa0KYPw&oe=696B1345)

The game has a scary layer. As you explore a crime scene, unsettling things could happen—shadows, whispers & apparitions.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491825050_1360261182487425_1701726842792685932_n.mp4?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=7SkNCMp7WPoQ7kNvwGSPvyr&_nc_oc=AdkpQvLvrRwUevkPrY3EoJAD7DRvgP4vL0zBWDERpvhXPu4GwE5Val63b97UR60oK_s&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=aCF9EVeQ9Dzp4Ta2iUKxiw&oh=00_AfrbOB0ZX5n-0Rw6yc5UQYi9MLhBnhuYLm5MTqYntnfbPA&oe=696AE531)

**Your mission**: Infiltrate the Syndicate, and capture the Hitman. The Syndicate doesn’t tolerate failure. And they definitely don’t tolerate rats.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/499303585_2027694071311803_6829180901132345132_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=HlGDbu0cergQ7kNvwGhzwGr&_nc_oc=Adk-z6iUaxZu-Q6bn00LPR_IfoMpohJhf1fGItSUl4WkhuDTCz6xqbdHpiUKpxGHWjo&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=aCF9EVeQ9Dzp4Ta2iUKxiw&oh=00_AfpvF9q3nmri3ni_y-yrASM3XAdBSkNdtGavoLP3rWpgrA&oe=696B08A3)

Each dead body has a background story of their own and you can explore more around to gather evidence and know more about the dead. The more you explore, the more rewarding it is. 

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491822924_4109581859309473_406554525783631080_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=l0wUVZGtVu8Q7kNvwHSsjXS&_nc_oc=AdmU4PBMhlwmBgmkdGdNkmIsBQRC5pxvXT9CiTFxC0kGv8g3JLr18xH_H_ng7J1WHhY&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=aCF9EVeQ9Dzp4Ta2iUKxiw&oh=00_AfoPQlcVlE8cwphs1N-eZGAjeZxS8qyyI_OounOwZ7r8OA&oe=696AE62A)
